export const theme = {
  // Main colors
  primary: '#4facfe',
  primaryLight: '#00f2fe',
  primaryDark: '#2980b9',
  secondary: '#8e44ad',
  secondaryLight: '#9b59b6',
  accent: '#f39c12',
  // Background colors
  background: '#0f172a',
  backgroundLight: '#1e293b',
  backgroundDark: '#0f0f1a',
  backgroundGradient: 'linear-gradient(135deg, #0f172a 0%, #1e293b 100%)',
  // Card and UI elements
  card: 'rgba(30, 41, 59, 0.8)',
  cardHover: 'rgba(30, 41, 59, 0.95)',
  cardBorder: 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1)',
  cardShadow: '0 10px 30px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3)',
  // Text colors
  text: '#f8fafc',
  textLight: '#ffffff',
  textMuted: '#94a3b8',
  textDark: '#64748b',
  // Status colors
  success: '#10b981',
  warning: '#f59e0b',
  error: '#ef4444',
  info: '#3b82f6',
  // Sizes
  borderRadius: '12px',
  borderRadiusLg: '20px',
  borderRadiusSm: '8px',
  // Animations
  transition: '0.3s ease',
  transitionFast: '0.15s ease',
  transitionSlow: '0.5s ease',
  // Blur effects
  blur: 'blur(10px)',
  blurLight: 'blur(5px)',
  blurHeavy: 'blur(20px)',
  // Breakpoints
  breakpoints: {
    xs: '480px',
    sm: '640px',
    md: '768px',
    lg: '1024px',
    xl: '1280px',
    xxl: '1536px'
  }
};

sourcesContent:
export const theme = {
  // Main colors
  primary: '#4facfe',
  primaryLight: '#00f2fe',
  primaryDark: '#2980b9',
  secondary: '#8e44ad',
  secondaryLight: '#9b59b6',
  accent: '#f39c12',
  
  // Background colors
  background: '#0f172a',
  backgroundLight: '#1e293b',
  backgroundDark: '#0f0f1a',
  backgroundGradient: 'linear-gradient(135deg, #0f172a 0%, #1e293b 100%)',
  
  // Card and UI elements
  card: 'rgba(30, 41, 59, 0.8)',
  cardHover: 'rgba(30, 41, 59, 0.95)',
  cardBorder: 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1)',
  cardShadow: '0 10px 30px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3)',
  
  // Text colors
  text: '#f8fafc',
  textLight: '#ffffff',
  textMuted: '#94a3b8',
  textDark: '#64748b',
  
  // Status colors
  success: '#10b981',
  warning: '#f59e0b',
  error: '#ef4444',
  info: '#3b82f6',
  
  // Sizes
  borderRadius: '12px',
  borderRadiusLg: '20px',
  borderRadiusSm: '8px',
  
  // Animations
  transition: '0.3s ease',
  transitionFast: '0.15s ease',
  transitionSlow: '0.5s ease',
  
  // Blur effects
  blur: 'blur(10px)',
  blurLight: 'blur(5px)',
  blurHeavy: 'blur(20px)',
  
  // Breakpoints
  breakpoints: {
    xs: '480px',
    sm: '640px',
    md: '768px',
    lg: '1024px',
    xl: '1280px',
    xxl: '1536px',
  },
};
